projects.title: SlideSmith
projects.subtitle: Enterprise-Grade AI Presentation Generation Platform
projects.summary: A production-ready, distributed multi-agent system that turns unstructured input into polished PPTX/PDF decks with parallel QA, semantic validation, and policy-based multi-model routing (cloud or local via Ollama).
highlights: 13-agent DAG pipeline with dependency resolution and parallel execution
Policy-based model routing: quality, speed, balanced, local-only
Parallel QA (facts, accessibility, readability) → ~75% latency reduction
Theme-consistent semantic export to PPTX & PDF with native charts
Provider abstraction for Ollama, OpenAI, OpenRouter
